str.txt: The installed application needs a JRE between version ${JRELocatorPanel.minVersion} and ${JRELocatorPanel.maxVersion}. A java runtime environment (JRE) will be not sufficient.
The installed application needs a valid JRE. Please select the JRE Path:
The chosen JRE has the wrong version (available:
). Should this JRE be used anyway?
The Windows registry contains a non-valid path for this JRE. Should this JRE be used anyway?

This software requires at least version ${JRELocatorPanel.minVersion} of the Java Runtime Environment (JRE).

If it is not installed, please go to http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads, to download and install it.
